value.title: The next healthcare revolution will have AI at its center
value.excerpt: Human life expectancy increased from 31 years in 1900 to 72 years in 2017. Today, we are on the cusp of another healthcare revolution driven by artificial intelligence.

value.title: Use the AWS Cloud for observational life sciences studies
value.excerpt: In this post, we discuss how to use the AWS Cloud and its services to accelerate observational studies for life sciences customers. We provide a reference architecture for architects, business owners, and technology decision-makers in the life sciences industry to automate the processes in clinical studies.

value.title: AI-powered supply chain visibility platform Altana nabs $15M

value.title: Improved algorithms may be more important for AI performance than faster hardware

value.title: Scale ML feature ingestion using Amazon SageMaker Feature Store
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Feature Store is a purpose-built solution for machine learning (ML) feature management. It helps data science teams reuse ML features across teams and models, serves features for model predictions at scale with low latency, and train and deploy new models more quickly and effectively.

value.title: Ordinary Lowly Lampposts Aiming To Stand Tall For Bolstering AI Self-Driving Cars

value.title: How To Prepare For The Coming AI Explosion In Business

value.title: German GPU sales point to more price hikes and a drop in availability this year
